Docs.summary: Specifies options that affect security in isolated storage.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState.Options%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property gets this enumeration to determine which operations can be performed in isolated storage.
A host application can override the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CheckSecuritySettings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to perform policy decisions based on a <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState> object, and then allow or prevent the increase in the quota size for isolated storage.
